akn:section.akn:heading: Disability of minority removed; investments by building, building and loan, and savings and loan associations.

akn:content.akn:p: The disability of minority of a resident of the District of Columbia who is eligible for guaranty of a loan pursuant to the Servicemenâ€™s Readjustment Act of 1944 (58 Stat. 284) and of a minor spouse of any such resident (when acting jointly with such resident) is hereby removed with respect to the incurring of any obligation all or part of which is guaranteed under the provisions of said Act or in conjunction with which a secondary loan is so guaranteed, and with respect to the exercise of the rights of ownership in any property acquired with the proceeds of any such obligation, including the right to sell, convey, lease, encumber, improve or maintain the same and to further obligate himself incident to his exercise of such rights.
